Payment in cash. Cash Bonus Check with dispatcher Blocked bonuses My bonuses get bonuses Update your bonus information Don't forget to collect the bonus for the next day. Rules for calculating bonuses: - Registration in the application - 1 bonus; - First order - 1 bonus; - Completed route - 1 bonus for every 1 whole hryvnia of the completed amount; - Login to the application - 1 bonus is credited no more than once a day. Bonuses can be used when ordering trips, provided that such a service is available in the address database you have chosen, as well as if the cost of the trip is fully covered by available bonuses at the rate of 100 bonuses = UAH 1. For up-to-date information and accrual of bonuses - click the button - GET BONUSES Apply selection Information about the number of bonuses has been updated Departure point "To order, press the button " Clear fields Card

Privacy Policy and 
 Data Protection We value your trust and strive to ensure the reliable protection of your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use and protect your personal information when you use our software. User email data is obtained through an authentication process using Firebase. This information is used to identify and authenticate the user to our application. Email is used to create and manage a user account, provide security, and restore access. To provide taxi ordering functionality in our application, we collect and store users' mobile phone numbers. This data is necessary to contact you and provide taxi ordering services. User device data is obtained through the process of sending a device token to a secure server using Firebase. This information is used to send personalized push notifications to users in our application. You can disable push notifications in your device settings. We make every effort to ensure the security of your data. All information, including email and phone number, is stored encrypted and access is limited to authorized employees only. By using our program and providing us with your personal data, you consent to the collection, use and transfer of data in accordance with this privacy policy. We take all necessary measures to ensure the security of your personal data and prevent unauthorized access to it. Our app adheres to the provisions of the European Union's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) on the collection, use and processing of personal data. You have the right to request access to, change or delete your personal data from our database at any time. To do this, contact us at taxi.easy.ua@gmail.com. By using our program, you agree to the terms of our privacy policy. We reserve the right to make changes to this policy, which will be notified to you. You have the right to request access to, change or delete your personal data from our database at any time. To do this, contact us at taxi.easy.ua@gmail.com. If you have additional questions or requests regarding privacy and data, please contact us at the contact address below. Andrii Korzhov
